title: Bride and Prejudice star Tori questioned over 'drinking while pregnant'
text:
Pregnant Bride and Prejudice star Tori hit breaking point following a shocking question and answer game on Sunday night's episode.

Tori - who is expecting her first child with fiancé Mark - and the other couples were asked a string of questions by anonymous members of the group, in a bid to get to know each other better.

But the mum-to-be was left gobsmacked by one query - after being asked why she was 'drinking while pregnant' by an unknown member of the group.

'Why are you drinking while pregnant?' Bride and Prejudice star Tori (right) was asked the uncomfortable question on Sunday night's episode

Tori was quick to accuse rival Dannii of asking the question - which she vehemently denied.

'Last time I checked, one standard drink a night, but, Dannii, go ahead,' Tori said, while everyone stared on in shock.

'That was not me! If you wanna start on me... No, no, no!' Dannii retorted.

'Yes, I might believe that, but I didn't ask that question. She's just assumed it's me.'

'It wasn't me!' Dannii (pictured) was left furious after Tori accused her of asking the question

Awkward game: The group were able to ask anonymous questions to the other couples about their relationship

Clearly upset, Tori decided to remove herself from the situation, saying: 'I'm going to bed for the night. I can't deal with this s**t anymore.'

Finding the situation too much, Tori was then seen bursting into tears in an emotional scene with her other half.

After the episode aired, Tori took to Instagram to unveil her side of the story.

Furious: Tori was left fuming with the question, and later broke down in tears over the question

'I was only four weeks pregnant when I found out while filming Bride and Prejudice,' she wrote.

'The pregnancy came as a shock to both James and I, so yes I had been drinking beforehand as I didn't know I was pregnant!

'When asked those questions at the dinner party about our pregnancy, I was so blown away and angry that anyone could ask that, but more so that production allowed the questions in at all.

'We weren't ready to talk about it as we were only five weeks along at the time. We were told there was no heartbeat and bub was not even coming up on a scan.'

Continuing the lengthy statement, she added: 'No guys, I don't drink while pregnant! I have a beautiful happy baby girl growing inside of me. So thank you everyone for your concern.'
description: A Bride and Prejudice star hit breaking point on Sunday night's episode.
authors: Nicole Douglas For Daily Mail Australia
